db2.module.php

00001 <?php
00002 /**
00003  * Osimo v2 Database Class.
00004  * Used for querying a MySQL database.
00005  *
00006  * @author Ryan LeFevre
00007  * @see OsimoDBQuery
00008  */
00009 class OsimoDB extends OsimoModule{
00010  protected $db_host;
00011  protected $db_user;
00012  protected $db_pass;
00013  protected $db_name;
00014  protected $autoconnect;
00015  private $conn;
00016  private $conn_db;
00017 
00018  /**
00019   * OsimoDB Constructor.
00020   *
00021   * @param Array $options (optional)
00022   */
00023  public function OsimoDB($options=false) {
00024   parent::OsimoModule();
00025   $this->defaults = array(
00026    'db_host'=>'localhost',
00027    'db_user'=>'root',
00028    'db_pass'=>'password',
00029    'db_name'=>'database',
00030    'error_type'=>'error_log',
00031    'autoconnect'=>true
00032   );
00033 
00034   /* Register the databases debugging defaults */
00035   get('debug')->register('OsimoDB', array(
00036     'events'=>false,
00037     'queries'=>false,
00038     'benchmarking'=>false
00039    ));
00040 
00041   $this->parseOptions($options);
00042   $this->init();
00043  }
00044 
00045  private function init() {
00046   if ($this->autoconnect) {
00047    $this->connect();
00048   }
00049  }
00050 
00051 
00052 
00053  /**
00054   * Connects to the database specified in the options.
00055   * If autoconnect is enabled (which is is by default),
00056   * this function will be called upon class instantiation.
00057   */
00058  public function connect() {
00059   if (!$this->conn) { // don't open a new connection if one already exists
00060    $this->conn = @mysql_connect($this->db_host, $this->db_user, $this->db_pass) or die("Could not connect to database!");
00061    $this->conn_db = @mysql_select_db($this->db_name)or die("Could not select database!");
00062    get('debug')->logMsg('OsimoDB', 'events', 'Opening database connection...');
00063 
00064    $status = explode('  ', mysql_stat());
00065    get('debug')->logMsg('OsimoDB', 'events', "Current database status:\n".print_r($status, true));
00066   }
00067  }
00068 
00069  /**
00070   * General escape function
00071   * If given an array, will escape every value in the array
00072   * The quotes option will put quotes around each item, useful
00073   * for the WHERE clause of a SQL query.
00074   * Note: this function is static.
00075   *
00076   * @param mixed $data
00077   * @param boolean $quotes (optional)
00078   * @return Escaped version of $data
00079   */
00080  public static function escape($data, $quotes=false) {
00081   if (is_array($data)) {
00082    foreach ($data as $key=>$var) {
00083     if ($quotes && !is_numeric($data[$key])) {
00084      $data[$key] = "'".self::escape($data[$key])."'";
00085     }
00086     else {
00087      $data[$key] = self::escape($data[$key]);
00088     }
00089    }
00090 
00091    return $data;
00092   }
00093   else {
00094    if ($quotes && !is_numeric($data)) {
00095     return "'".mysql_real_escape_string($data)."'";
00096    }
00097    else {
00098     return mysql_real_escape_string($data);
00099    }
00100   }
00101  }
00102 
00103  /**
00104   * General date formatting function.
00105   * Will format any date for the DATETIME database fieldtype.
00106   * Can take both timestamps and pre-formatted dates.  If $date is false,
00107   * then it assumes the current time.
00108   * Note: this function is static.
00109   *
00110   * @param mixed $date (optional)
00111   * @return The date formatted for MySQL DATETIME format.
00112   */
00113  public static function formatDateForDB($date=false) {
00114   if (!$date) { $date = time(); }
00115   elseif (!is_numeric($date)) { $date = strtotime($date); }
00116   return date('Y-m-d H:i:s', $date);
00117  }

00121  /**
00122   * Echos any errors reported by MySQL from the 
00123   * last executed query.
00124   */
00125  public function get_error() {
00126   echo mysql_error();
00127  }

00129  # Now starts the tasty stuff...

00133  /**
00134   * Begins a SELECT MySQL query chain.
00135   *
00136   * @param mixed $args (optional)
00137   * @return new OsimoDBQuery object
00138   */
00139  public function select($args=false) {
00140   get('debug')->logMsg('OsimoDB', 'events', "Starting SELECT query.");
00141   return new OsimoDBQuery('select', $args, $this);
00142  }
00143 
00144  /**
00145   * Begins an INSERT MySQL query chain.
00146   *
00147   * @param mixed $args
00148   * @param int $insertID (reference)
00149   * @return new OsimoDBQuery object
00150   */
00151  public function insert($args) {
00152   get('debug')->logMsg('OsimoDB', 'events', "Starting INSERT query.");
00153   return new OsimoDBQuery('insert', $args, $this);
00154  }
00155

00157   * Begins an UPDATE MySQL query chain.
00158   *
00159   * @param mixed $args
00160   * @return new OsimoDBQuery object
00161   */
00162  public function update($args) {
00163   get('debug')->logMsg('OsimoDB', 'events', "Starting UPDATE query.");
00164   return new OsimoDBQuery('update', $args, $this);
00165  }

00167  /**
00168   * Begins a generic MySQL query chain.
00169   * This function is primarily used when the developer
00170   * wishes to write the whole SQL query as a string instead
00171   * of building the query using the chaining functions.
00172   *
00173   * @param String $query
00174   * @return new OsimoDBQuery object
00175   */
00176  public function query($query) {
00177   get('debug')->logMsg('OsimoDB', 'events', "Starting generic query.");
00178   return new OsimoDBQuery('query', $query, $this);
00179  }

00188  public function delete() {
00189   get('debug')->logMsg('OsimoDB', 'events', "Starting DELETE query.");
00190   return new OsimoDBQuery('delete', false, $this);

00195 
00196 /**
00197  * Database query class.
00198  * Instantiated object represents a SQL query
00199  * that can be executed to retrieve data from
00200  * a MySQL database.
00201  *
00202  * @author Ryan LeFevre
00203  * @see OsimoDB
00204  */
00205 class OsimoDBQuery {
00206  private $db;
00207  private $type;
00208  private $fields;
00209  private $tables;
00210  private $joins;
00211  private $where;
00212  private $query;
00213  private $order_by;
00214 
00215  /**
00216   * Constructor for OsimoDBQuery class.
00217   * This should strictly be called from the OsimoDB class.
00218   *
00219   * @param String $type
00220   * @param mixed $args
00221   *  Can be Array or String with comma separated values
00222   * @param OsimoDB $db
00223   * @return the current OsimoDBQuery object (allows chainability)
00224   */
00225  function OsimoDBQuery($type, $args, $db) {
00226   $this->db = $db;
00227   $this->type = $type;
00228   $this->joins = array();
00229   $this->order_by = array();
00230 
00231   if ($this->processArgs($args)) {
00232    return $this;
00233   }
00234 
00235   return NULL;
00236  }
00237 
00238  private function processArgs($args) {
00239   if (empty($args) || !$args) {
00240    if ($this->type == 'select') {
00241     $this->fields = array("*");
00242    }
00243    elseif ($this->type == 'delete') {
00244     $this->fields = '';
00245    }
00246    elseif ($this->type == 'update') {
00247     trigger_error("OsimoDB: Missing table for DB UPDATE query", E_USER_ERROR);
00248     return NULL;
00249    }
00250    elseif ($this->type == 'insert') {
00251     trigger_error("OsimoDB: Missing field info for DB INSERT query", E_USER_ERROR);
00252    }
00253    else {
00254     trigger_error("OsimoDB: Invalid start of SQL query - missing arguments", E_USER_ERROR);
00255     return NULL;
00256    }
00257   }
00258   elseif (!is_array($args) && is_string($args)) {
00259    if ($this->type == 'select' || $this->type == 'delete' || $this->type == 'insert') {
00260     $this->fields = $this->trimData(explode(',', $args));
00261    }
00262    elseif ($this->type == 'query') {
00263     $this->fields = NULL;
00264     $this->query = $args;
00265    }
00266    else {
00267     $this->tables = $this->trimData(explode(',', $args));
00268    }
00269   }
00270   else {
00271    if ($this->type == 'select' || $this->type == 'delete' || $this->type == 'insert') {
00272     $this->fields = $args;
00273    }
00274    elseif ($this->type == 'update') {
00275     $this->tables = $args;
00276    }
00277    else {
00278     $this->tables = $args;
00279    }
00280   }
00281 
00282   return true;
00283  }
00284 
00285  /**
00286   * Adds FROM clause to MySQL query.
00287   *
00288   * @param mixed $tables
00289   *  Can be Array or String with comma separated values
00290   * @return the current OsimoDBQuery object (allows chainability)
00291   */
00292  public function from($tables) {
00293   if ($this->type != 'select' && $this->type != 'delete') {
00294    trigger_error("OsimoDB: Invalid SQL chain - from() not allowed for ".$this->type." queries", E_USER_ERROR);
00295    return NULL;
00296   }
00297 
00298   if (!is_array($tables) && is_string($tables)) {
00299    $this->tables = $this->trimData(explode(",", $tables));
00300   }
00301   else {
00302    $this->tables = $tables;
00303   }
00304 
00305   return $this;
00306  }
00307 
00308  /**
00309   * Adds a SET clause to an UPDATE MySQL query.
00310   *
00311   * @param mixed $args
00312   *  Can be Array or String of comma separated values.
00313   * @return the current OsimoDBQuery object (allows chainability)
00314   */
00315  public function set($args) {
00316   if($this->type != 'update'){
00317    trigger_error("OsimoDB: Invalid SQL chain - set() not allowed for ".$this->type." queries", E_USER_ERROR);
00318    return NULL;
00319   }
00320   
00321   if (is_array($args)) {
00322    $temp = array();
00323    foreach ($args as $field=>$val) {
00324     $temp[] = $field."=".$val."";
00325    }
00326 
00327    $this->fields = implode(",", $temp);
00328   }
00329   else {
00330    $this->fields = $args;
00331   }
00332 
00333   return $this;
00334  }
00335 
00336  /**
00337   * Adds an INTO clause to an INSERT MySQL query.
00338   *
00339   * @param String $table
00340   * @return the current OsimoDBQuery object (allows chainability)
00341   */
00342  public function into($table) {
00343   if ($this->type != 'insert') {
00344    trigger_error("OsimoDB: Invalid SQL chain - into() not allowed for ".$this->type." queries", E_USER_ERROR);
00345    return NULL;
00346   }
00347 
00348   if (is_array($table)) {
00349    trigger_error("OsimoDB: Invalid datatype - into() can only take a string as an argument", E_USER_ERROR);
00350    return NULL;
00351   }
00352 
00353   $this->tables = $table;
00354 
00355   return $this;
00356  }
00357 
00358  /**
00359   * Adds a LEFT [OUTER] JOIN clause to a SELECT MySQL query.
00360   *
00361   * @param String $table
00362   *  The table to join on
00363   * @param String $on
00364   *  The join condition, aka the ON part of the JOIN clause
00365   * @param boolean $outer (optional)
00366   *  Should the join be an OUTER JOIN or not?
00367   * @return the current OsimoDBQuery object (allows chainability)
00368   */
00369  public function left_join($table, $on, $outer=false) {
00370   $outer ? $type = "LEFT OUTER" : $type = "LEFT";
00371   $this->save_join($type, $table, $on);
00372 
00373   return $this;
00374  }
00375 
00376  /**
00377   * Adds a RIGHT [OUTER] JOIN clause to a SELECT MySQL query.
00378   *
00379   * @param String $table
00380   *  The table to join on
00381   * @param String $on
00382   *  The join condition, aka the ON part of the JOIN clause
00383   * @param boolean $outer (optional)
00384   *  Should the join be an OUTER JOIN or not?
00385   * @return the current OsimoDBQuery object (allows chainability)
00386   */
00387  public function right_join($table, $on, $outer=false) {
00388   $outer ? $type = "RIGHT OUTER" : $type = "RIGHT";
00389   $this->save_join($type, $table, $on);
00390 
00391   return $this;
00392  }
00393 
00394  /**
00395   * Adds a INNER JOIN clause to a SELECT MySQL query.
00396   *
00397   * @param String $table
00398   *  The table to join on
00399   * @param String $on
00400   *  The join condition, aka the ON part of the JOIN clause
00401   * @return the current OsimoDBQuery object (allows chainability)
00402   */
00403  public function inner_join($table, $on) {
00404   $this->save_join("INNER", $table, $on);
00405 
00406   return $this;
00407  }
00408 
00409  /**
00410   * Adds a OUTER JOIN clause to a SELECT MySQL query.
00411   *
00412   * @param String $table
00413   *  The table to join on
00414   * @param String $on
00415   *  The join condition, aka the ON part of the JOIN clause
00416   * @return the current OsimoDBQuery object (allows chainability)
00417   */
00418  public function outer_join($table, $on) {
00419   $this->save_join("OUTER", $table, $on);
00420 
00421   return $this;
00422  }
00423 
00424  private function save_join($type, $table, $on) {
00425   if ($this->type != 'select') {
00426    trigger_error("OsimoDB: Invalid SQL chain - left_join() now allowed for ".$this->type." queries", E_USER_ERROR);
00427    return NULL;
00428   }
00429 
00430   $this->joins[] = "$type JOIN $table".$this->on($on);
00431  }
00432 
00433  private function on($on) {
00434   if (stripos($on, '=')===false) { //use USING syntax
00435    return " USING ($on) ";
00436   }
00437   else {
00438    return " ON ($on) ";
00439   }
00440  }
00441 
00442  /**
00443   * Adds a WHERE clause to a MySQL query.
00444   * This function takes a variable number of arguments,
00445   * and works exactly like printf() or scanf().
00446   *
00447   * @return the current OsimoDBQuery object (allows chainability)
00448   */
00449  public function where() {
00450   if (!func_num_args()) {
00451    trigger_error("OsimoDB: Missing arguments for where clause - ignoring", E_USER_NOTICE);
00452    return $this;
00453   }
00454 
00455   $this->where['str'] = func_get_arg(0);
00456   for ($i=1;$i<func_num_args();$i++) {
00457    $this->where['vars'][] = func_get_arg($i);
00458   }
00459 
00460   return $this;
00461  }
00462 
00463  /**
00464   * Adds a LIMIT clause to a MySQL query.
00465   *
00466   * @param int $start
00467   * @param mixed $num  (optional)
00468   *  If $num isn't false, then the output is: LIMIT $start,$num
00469   * @return the current OsimoDBQuery object (allows chainability)
00470   */
00471  public function limit($start, $num=false) {
00472   $this->limit = $start;
00473   if ($num) {
00474    $this->limit .= ",$num";
00475   }
00476 
00477   return $this;
00478  }
00479 
00480  /**
00481   * Adds an ORDER BY clause to a MySQL query.
00482   * Can be of format: order_by(Array("col_name"=>"ASC"));
00483   * or: order_by("col_name","ASC");
00484   *
00485   * @param mixed $cols
00486   *  If type is Array, then $dir will be ignored.
00487   * @param String $dir  (optional)
00488   *  Can only be ASC or DESC.
00489   * @return the current OsimoDBQuery object (allows chainability)
00490   */
00491  public function order_by($cols, $dir=false) {
00492   if (is_array($cols)) {
00493    $this->order_by = $cols;
00494   }
00495   else {
00496    if ($dir == false) {
00497     trigger_error("OsimoDB: Missing ORDER BY direction for SQL query", E_USER_ERROR);
00498     return NULL;
00499    }
00500    else {
00501     $this->order_by[$cols] = $dir;
00502    }
00503   }
00504 
00505   return $this;
00506  }
00507 
00508  /**
00509   *  Adds a VALUES clause to an INSERT MySQL query.
00510   *
00511   * @TODO This function should work similar to the where() function so that
00512   * data can be automatically escaped.
00513   *
00514   * @param Array $args
00515   * @return the current OsimoDBQuery object (allows chainability)
00516   */
00517  public function values($args) {
00518   if ($this->type != 'insert') {
00519    trigger_error("OsimoDB: Invalid SQL chain - values() now allowed for ".$this->type." queries", E_USER_ERROR);
00520    return NULL;
00521   }
00522   if (count($args) % count($this->fields) != 0) {
00523    trigger_error("OsimoDB: Invalid SQL data - incorrect number of entries for values()", E_USER_ERROR);
00524    return NULL;
00525   }
00526 
00527   $this->values = $args;
00528 
00529   return $this;
00530  }
00531 
00532  /**
00533   * Returns a single value/cell from a MySQL table.
00534   *
00535   * @param boolean $cache        (optional)
00536   *  Should this value be cached or not?
00537   * @param int $cache_length (optional)
00538   *  If caching is enabled, how long should it be cached for?
00539   * @return String of data returned from the MySQL query.
00540   */
00541  public function cell($cache=false, $cache_length=300) {
00542   if ($cache) {
00543    get('debug')->logMsg('OsimoDB', 'events', 'Referring to OsimoCache for data with expire time of '.$cache_length.' seconds.');
00544    $data = reset(reset(get('cache')->sqlquery($this->query(false), $cache_length)));
00545    return $data;
00546   }
00547 
00548   $result = $this->query();
00549   if ($result && mysql_num_rows($result)>0) {
00550    return reset(mysql_fetch_row($result));
00551   }
00552 
00553   return false;
00554  }
00555 
00556  /**
00557   * Returns a single row/tuple from a MySQL table.
00558   *
00559   * @param boolean $cache (optional)
00560   *  Should this data be cached or not?
00561   * @param int $cache_length (optional)
00562   *  If caching is enabled, how long should it be cached for?
00563   * @return One-dimensional array of data returned from the MySQL query.
00564   */
00565  public function row($cache=false, $cache_length=300) {
00566   if (!isset($this->limit)) {
00567    $this->limit(1);
00568   }
00569 
00570   if ($cache) {
00571    get('debug')->logMsg('OsimoDB', 'events', 'Referring to OsimoCache for data with expire time of '.$cache_length.' seconds.');
00572    $data = reset(get('cache')->sqlquery($this->query(false), $cache_length));
00573    get('debug')->logMsg('OsimoDB', 'events', 'Using OsimoCache - '.$this->query);
00574    return $data;
00575   }
00576 
00577   $result = $this->query();
00578   if ($result && mysql_num_rows($result)>0) {
00579    return mysql_fetch_assoc($result);
00580   }
00581 
00582   return false;
00583  }
00584 
00585  /**
00586   * Returns multiple rows/tuples from a MySQL table.
00587   *
00588   * @param boolean $cache (optional)
00589   *  Should this data be cached or not?
00590   * @param int $cache_length (optional)
00591   *  If caching is enabled, how long should it be cached for?
00592   * @return Two-dimensional array of data returned from the MySQL query.
00593   */
00594  public function rows($cache=false, $cache_length=300) {
00595   if ($cache) {
00596    get('debug')->logMsg('OsimoDB', 'events', 'Referring to OsimoCache for data with expire time of '.$cache_length.' seconds.');
00597    $data = get('cache')->sqlquery($this->query(false), $cache_length);
00598    get('debug')->logMsg('OsimoDB', 'events', 'Using OsimoCache - '.$this->query);
00599    return $data;
00600   }
00601 
00602   $result = $this->query();
00603   if ($result && mysql_num_rows($result)>0) {
00604    $return = array();
00605    while ($data = mysql_fetch_assoc($result)) {
00606     $return[] = $data;
00607    }
00608 
00609    return $return;
00610   }
00611 
00612   return false;
00613  }
00614 
00615  /**
00616   * Executes a MySQL INSERT query and places the last insert ID
00617   * into the parameter $insertID.
00618   *
00619   * @param int $insertID (reference)
00620   *  The last insert ID returned by mysql_insert_id();
00621   * @return Boolean reflecting the query success.
00622   */
00623  public function insert(&$insertID=false) {
00624   $result = $this->query();
00625   if ($result) {
00626    $insertID = mysql_insert_id();
00627    return true;
00628   }
00629 
00630   return false;
00631  }
00632 
00633  /**
00634   * Executes a MySQL UPDATE query.
00635   *
00636   * @return Boolean reflecting the query success.
00637   */
00638  public function update() {
00639   $result = $this->query();
00640   if ($result) {
00641    return true;
00642   }
00643 
00644   return false;
00645  }
00646 
00647  /**
00648   * Executes a generic MySQL query, and also executes
00649   * the queries for the helper functions above.
00650   *
00651   * @param boolean $run (optional)
00652   *  Should the function execute the query or simply return the SQL String?
00653   * @param int $cache (optional)
00654   *  Should this data be cached or not?
00655   * @param int $cache_length (optional)
00656   *  If caching is enabled, how long should it be cached for?
00657   * @return If $run is true, will return the MySQL result resource,
00658   * otherwise it will return the SQL query without executing it.
00659   */
00660  public function query($run=true, $cache=false, $cache_length=300) {
00661   $starttime = microtime(true);
00662   get('debug')->timerStart('OsimoDB', $starttime);
00663 
00664   if (!$this->queryValidator()) {
00665    return NULL;
00666   }
00667 
00668   if ($this->type != 'query') {
00669    $this->queryBuilder();
00670   }
00671 
00672   if ($run && $cache && CACHE_TYPE == 'memcache') {
00673    return get('cache')->sqlquery($this->query, $cache_length);
00674   }
00675 
00676   if ($run) {
00677    $result = mysql_query($this->query);
00678    get('debug')->logMsg('OsimoDB', 'queries', $this->query);
00679    get('debug')->timerEnd('OsimoDB', $starttime, "Query built and executed in ");
00680    return $result;
00681   }
00682 
00683   return $this->query;
00684  }
00685 
00686  private function queryBuilder() {
00687   if ($this->type == 'select' || $this->type == 'delete') {
00688    /* SELECT/DELETE fields */
00689    $query = strtoupper($this->type) . ' ';
00690    if (is_array($this->fields)) {
00691     $this->fields = OsimoDB::escape($this->fields);
00692     $query .= implode(',', $this->fields);
00693    }
00694 
00695    /* FROM tables */
00696    $query .= ' FROM ';
00697    $query .= implode(',', $this->tables);
00698 
00699    /* Table joins */
00700    if (count($this->joins) > 0) {
00701     $query .= ' '.implode(" ", $this->joins);
00702    }
00703 
00704    /* WHERE statement */
00705    if (is_array($this->where)) {
00706     $query .= ' WHERE '.$this->parseWhere().' ';
00707    }
00708 
00709    if ($this->type == 'select' && count($this->order_by) > 0) {
00710     $query .= ' ORDER BY ';
00711     foreach ($this->order_by as $col=>$dir) {
00712      $temp[] = "$col $dir";
00713     }
00714     $query .= implode(",", $temp);
00715    }
00716 
00717    /* LIMIT statement */
00718    if (isset($this->limit)) {
00719     $query .= ' LIMIT '.$this->limit;
00720    }
00721   }
00722   elseif ($this->type == 'update') {
00723    /* UPDATE tables */
00724    $query = strtoupper($this->type) . ' ';
00725    $query .= implode(",", $this->tables);
00726 
00727    /* SET fields */
00728    $query .= ' SET ';
00729    $query .= $this->fields;
00730 
00731    /* WHERE statement */
00732    if (is_array($this->where)) {
00733     $query .= ' WHERE '.$this->parseWhere().' ';
00734    }
00735 
00736    /* LIMIT statement */
00737    if (isset($this->limit)) {
00738     $query .= ' LIMIT '.$this->limit;
00739    }
00740   }
00741 
00742   $this->query = $query;
00743   return $this->query;
00744  }
00745 
00746  private function parseWhere() {
00747   if (isset($this->where['vars'])) {
00748    return call_user_func_array(
00749     'sprintf',
00750     array_merge(
00751      (array) $this->where['str'],
00752      OsimoDB::escape($this->where['vars'], true)
00753     )
00754    );
00755   }
00756 
00757   return $this->where['str'];
00758  }
00759 
00760  private function queryValidator() {
00761   if ($this->type == 'query') { return true; }
00762   if ($this->type == 'select' || $this->type == 'update') {
00763    if (!$this->fields || empty($this->fields)) {
00764     trigger_error("OsimoDB: Missing fields for query statement", E_USER_ERROR);
00765     return false;
00766    }
00767   }
00768 
00769   if (!$this->tables || empty($this->tables)) {
00770    trigger_error("OsimoDB: Missing table declaration", E_USER_ERROR);
00771    return false;
00772   }
00773 
00774   return true;
00775  }
00776 
00777  private function trimData($data) {
00778   if (is_array($data)) {
00779    foreach ($data as $key=>$val) {
00780     $data[$key] = $this->trimData($data[$key]);
00781    }
00782 
00783    return $data;
00784   }
00785 
00786   return trim($data);
00787  }
00788 
00789  /**
00790   * Echoing this class (without executing the query)
00791   * will output the built SQL query itself.
00792   */
00793  public function __toString() {
00794   return $this->query(false);
00795  }
00796 }
